name: Introduction to Memoir Writing
description: This course provides an introduction to the craft of writing memoirs, covering basic writing techniques, as well as exploring the purpose and potential of the genre.

name: Creative Writing Fundamentals
description: This course covers the fundamentals of writing fiction and creative non-fiction, including characterization, point of view, dialogue, plot, and structure.

name: Advanced Creative Writing
description: This course covers advanced writing techniques, including story arc, theme, dialogue, and character development.

name: Advanced Memoir Writing
description: This course covers advanced techniques for writing memoirs, including narrative structure, audience, and style.
